title: Micheál Martin - Wikipedia
snippet: Martin was awarded "Politician of the Year" by the Journal for his performance and election result. He was elected again as Taoiseach in a 95–76 vote by the Dáil on 23 January 2025 following a coalition agreement between Fianna Fáil, Fine Gael and with the support of several independent TDs.

title: Micheál Martin confident he will remain as Fianna Fáil leader as he receives presidential report - Irish Mirror
snippet: 11:17, 16 Dec 2025 · View Image · Taoiseach Micheal Martin speaking to reporters before a Cabinet meeting at Government Buildings, Dublin. Photo by: Cillian Sherlock/PA Wire(Image: PA) Taoiseach Micheál Martin said he isn’t concerned his leadership is in trouble after receiving a review into his party’s failed presidential campaign.

title: Press remarks by President António Costa following the meeting with Taoiseach of Ireland, Micheál Martin - Consilium
snippet: We are all conscious that the EU needs to adapt to a new geopolitical reality and our budget has to reflect that. We need to reach an agreement by the end of next year and the Irish Presidency will play a crucial role in making it happen.

title: Martin ‘confident’ in his leadership as Fianna Fail TDs receive election report - Kildare Live
snippet: 16 Dec 2025 10:01 AM · Taoiseach Micheal Martin has said his leadership of Fianna Fail is not in trouble as his parliamentary party is set to review a long-awaited report into its selection process for the presidential candidate.

title: Martin 'absolutely' confident he will remain FF leader
snippet: Taoiseach Micheál Martin has said he has absolute confidence in remaining as Fianna Fáil leader after receiving the review of his party's presidential election campaign.
